verses.verse: In the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3099>Joahaz<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> began <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

He was <S%H8141>twenty-five<s%> years <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8141>twenty-nine<s%> years in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3086>Jehoaddin<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7535>yet<s%> not like <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that <S%H3101>Joash<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

However the high <S%H1116>places<s%> were not taken <S%H5493>away:<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places.<s%>

It <S%H4467>happened,<s%> as soon as the kingdom was <S%H2388>established<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that he <S%H5221>killed<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> who had <S%H5221>slain<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%>

but the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5221>murderers<s%> he <S%H4191>didn't<s%> put to death; according to that which is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall not be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for the <S%H1121>children,<s%> nor the <S%H1121>children<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> for the <S%H1>fathers;<s%> but every <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> for his own <S%H2399>sin.<s%>"

He <S%H5221>killed<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> in the <S%H1516>Valley<s%> of <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H5554>Sela<s%> by <S%H4421>war,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> its <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3371>Joktheel,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Then <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3060>Jehoash,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> let us <S%H7200>look<s%> one another in the <S%H6440>face.<s%>"

<S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H2336>thistle<s%> that was in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H730>cedar<s%> that was in <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'Give your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%> Then a <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>animal<s%> that was in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H7429>by,<s%> and trampled down the <S%H2336>thistle.<s%>

You have <S%H5221>indeed<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and your <S%H3820>heart<s%> has lifted you <S%H5375>up.<s%> Enjoy the <S%H3513>glory<s%> of <S%H3427>it,<s%> and stay at <S%H1004>home;<s%> for why should you <S%H1624>meddle<s%> to your <S%H7451>harm,<s%> that you should <S%H5307>fall,<s%> even <S%H3063>you,<s%> and Judah with you?'"

But <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> would not <S%H8085>listen.<s%> So <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up;<s%> and he and <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> one another in the <S%H6440>face<s%> at Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> which belongs to <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
<S%H3063>Judah<s%> was <S%H5062>defeated<s%> <S%H6440>by<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H168>tent.<s%>

<S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> at Beth <S%H1053>Shemesh,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and broke <S%H6555>down<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to the <S%H6438>corner<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and in the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H1121>hostages<s%> <S%H7725>also,<s%> and returned to <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> which he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and his <S%H1369>might,<s%> and how he <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

<S%H558>Amaziah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3060>Jehoash<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H558>Amaziah,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>

They <S%H5375>brought<s%> him on <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and he was <S%H6912>buried<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> who was <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and made him <S%H4427>king<s%> in the place of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H558>Amaziah.<s%>
He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H359>Elath,<s%> and <S%H7725>restored<s%> it to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

He <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H573>Amittai,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> who was of Gath <S%H1662>Hepher.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6040>affliction<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that it was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H4784>bitter;<s%> for there was <S%H657>none<s%> shut <S%H6113>up<s%> nor <S%H5800>left<s%> at <S%H5826>large,<s%> neither was there any helper for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>didn't<s%> say that he would blot <S%H4229>out<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from under the <S%H8064>sky;<s%> but he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and all that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and his <S%H1369>might,<s%> how he <S%H3898>warred,<s%> and how he <S%H7725>recovered<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> which had belonged to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
